author: Chris Riotta
title: George Stephanopoulos: Good Morning America host reveals he has coronavirus live on air
description: George Stephanopoulos, the host of ABC News' Good Morning America, has confirmed he was diagnosed with Covid-19 on live-television and said he was not experiencing major symptoms after his wife also contracted the novel virus.
content:
George Stephanopoulos, the host of Good Morning America, has confirmed he was diagnosed with Covid-19 on live-television and said he was not experiencing major symptoms after his wife also contracted the novel virus.
Ive never had a fever, he said about his … [+312 chars]
